closers.title: Closers
closers.description: Sales team members who create custom packages for authors

empty.title: No closers found
empty.description: Create your first closer account to get started

admins.title: Admins
admins.description: Administrative users with platform management access

empty.title: No admins found
empty.description: Create your first admin account to get started

createCloser.title: Create Closer Account
createCloser.description: Add a new sales team member

fields.emailDescription: The closer will receive login credentials at this email
fields.name: Full Name
fields.nameDescription: Full name of the closer (2-100 characters)
fields.passwordDescription: If not provided, a temporary password will be generated and sent via email
fields.commissionRateDescription: Percentage of sales the closer earns (0-100%)
fields.isActiveDescription: Allow the closer to log in and create packages

createAdmin.title: Create Admin Account
createAdmin.description: Add a new administrator (Super Admin only)

fields.emailDescription: The admin will receive login credentials at this email
fields.name: Full Name
fields.nameDescription: Full name of the admin (2-100 characters)
fields.passwordDescription: If not provided, a temporary password will be generated and sent via email
fields.adminLevelDescription: Super Admin has full access, Regular Admin has limited permissions
fields.permissionsDescription: Select specific permissions for this admin

levels.SUPER_ADMIN_DESC: Full access to all features including creating other admins and financial settings
levels.REGULAR_ADMIN_DESC: Access to most features, cannot create admins or access financial settings
